description: Elegant Mansion with panoramic views. 6 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms. Private pool and garden. Modern kitchen. Close to amenities. $2,500,000.
Charming Victorian townhouse. 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms. Classic architecture. Spacious living areas. Quaint backyard. Walkable neighborhood. $1,200,000.
Contemporary penthouse with city skyline views. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. Open-concept design. High-end finishes. Rooftop terrace. $1,800,000.
Seaside cottage with oceanfront views. 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom. Coastal charm. Sunroom and deck. Relaxing retreat. $750,000.
Luxurious suburban estate. 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms. Grand foyer. Gourmet kitchen. Home theater. Expansive backyard. $2,300,000.
Rustic log cabin in the woods. 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom. Stone fireplace. Wrap-around porch. Tranquil surroundings. $500,000.
Mid-century modern gem. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. Sleek design. Large windows. Private backyard. Desirable neighborhood. $1,100,000.
Coastal bungalow with beach access. 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms. Bright interiors. Deck with ocean views. Walk to the shore. $1,400,000.
Quaint farmhouse on acreage. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. Wrap-around porch. Barn and garden. Serene countryside setting. $900,000.
Modern townhouse in the city center. 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. Open floor plan. Rooftop terrace. Walk to shops and dining. $800,000.
Sunny Mediterranean villa. 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms. Courtyard and pool. Hillside location. Views of the city and mountains. $1,600,000.
Historic colonial revival. 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms. Original details. Spacious rooms. Manicured garden. Prestigious address. $2,000,000.
Sleek urban loft. 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom. Industrial chic. High ceilings. Exposed brick. Close to public transit and nightlife. $600,000.
Lakefront retreat with dock. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. Panoramic lake views. Deck and boat slip. Peaceful and secluded. $1,100,000.
Suburban family home. 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms. Updated kitchen. Playroom and backyard. Top-rated schools. Close to parks. $950,000.
Ski-in/ski-out chalet. 6 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms. Mountain views. Fireplace and hot tub. Access to slopes. Ideal for winter enthusiasts. $2,800,000.
Architect-designed modern masterpiece. 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms. Energy-efficient. Smart home features. Private courtyard. $1,700,000.
English Tudor in a quiet cul-de-sac. 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms. Elegant details. Landscaped garden. Close to schools and shopping. $1,300,000.
Countryside log home. 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms. Vaulted ceilings. Wrap-around porch. Forested acreage. Perfect for nature lovers. $1,200,000.
Artistic loft in the arts district. 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom. Exposed beams. Gallery-style living space. Walk to galleries and cafes. $700,000.
